pages.text: Sand is a class of middle sized particle and affected by gravity. $(l:mechanics/sluicing)Sluicing$() with a gold pan will yield various products depending on the type.
Normally found along beaches and rivers. Used as a construction material in default and new recipes.
Normally found at surface level in Mesa biomes. Used as a construction material in default and new recipes.
Main sediment component of the Soul Sand Valley biome.
Normally found scattered along beaches. Used as a construction material in default and new recipes.
Normally found scattered along beaches. Used as a construction material in default and new recipes.
Normally found in Desert biomes. Unlike other sands, this type has limited uses.
